item.description:
Sorry for the delay, but it took a while to figure out what was going on. But, we now have the details for the next meetup event!

Yes, the Boston Congress has been cancelled, but Edwin Pabon and DJ Hernan are now throwing a Mini-Congress that weekend to satisfy the many salseros who were looking forward to the weekend.

When: Friday, March 30 & Saturday, March 31


Performers from New York include
Pzazz Dancers
Tropical Image Dancers
Dance Dreamzzz

Performers from Boston include:
Masacote Entertainment
Salsa y Control
Hips on Fire
Mambo Slaves

.....More Dancers and info coming to you soon!

DJ's include:
DJ Rob and Master Pedreto Santiago
Hernan choque

Advance Tickets $15
$20 @ the door each night

OR! $25 for both nights with the Salsa Meetup Group!

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Salsa Fest Mini Congress
